author: ykumar05
body:
Huge radius expression.

#### PR description: High pT Tracks(>1.2 TeV) were reconstructed as twice their gen counterpart's value. The file Trajectory.cc present at FastSimulation/SimplifiedGeometryPropagator/src featured an expression that puts a threshold beyond which the tracks were assumed straight(Huge Radius!). This expression was causing troubles for the high pT tracks beyond 1.2 TeV. I removed the condition and observed reconstructed pT in order with the simulated Gen pT.
